base_description: White teapot with gold accents, round shape.
part_description: Features a round body, lid with knob, curved spout, and handle. Gold accents on lid, spout, and base. Lid fits snugly on top. Handle attached to the body opposite the spout.
internal_interaction_description: The lid sits securely atop the teapot, preventing spills. The spout is designed for smooth pouring, aligned with the handle for easy grip. The handle provides balance and support when pouring. The round body holds liquid efficiently, distributing heat evenly.
external_interaction_description: Used for serving tea, it interacts with cups and saucers. The handle allows easy lifting and pouring. The spout directs liquid into cups, minimizing spills. Its aesthetic design complements table settings, enhancing visual appeal during tea service.
